scripts.train-analytics: python3 analytics/parse_and_featurize.py --infile logs/latest.ndjson --outfile analytics/feats.parquet && python3 analytics/train_models.py --features analytics/feats.parquet --model_out analytics/models
scripts.train-analytics:win: python analytics/parse_and_featurize.py --infile logs/latest.ndjson --outfile analytics/feats.parquet && python analytics/train_models.py --features analytics/feats.parquet --model_out analytics/models
